qa.name: Captain Elias
qa.clothing: Worn fisherman's sweater and rugged boots

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the darkest of nights, a beacon of hope shines for those lost at sea.
json_to_edit.description: The ancient lighthouse stands tall against the raging storm, guiding lost souls to safety.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, howling wind, distant thunder
json_to_edit.name: Lighthouse of Lost Souls
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Elias maintains the lighthouse during a fierce storm, guiding ships to safety.

qa.action: The majestic lighthouse stands tall on jagged cliffs, its beam cutting through the stormy night.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the spiral staircase, his weathered hands gripping the railing.

tr.action: The captain's focused eyes as he inspects the intricate lighthouse mechanism.

xc.action: A ship struggles against the towering waves, the lighthouse beam barely visible through the rain.

ka.action: Captain Elias leans against the lighthouse window, scanning the horizon with determination.

fn.action: The captain's eyes light up as he spots a ship safely entering the harbor.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the darkest of nights, a beacon of hope shines for those lost at sea.
updated_json.description: The ancient lighthouse stands tall against the raging storm, guiding lost souls to safety.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, howling wind, distant thunder
updated_json.name: Lighthouse of Lost Souls
updated_json.scene_summary: Captain Elias maintains the lighthouse during a fierce storm, guiding ships to safety.

qa.action: The majestic lighthouse stands tall on jagged cliffs, its beam cutting through the stormy night.

tr.action: The captain's focused eyes as he inspects the intricate lighthouse mechanism.

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements of the json unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", and "fn", which are the second, fourth, and sixth shots respectively. we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and adjust the "number_of_shots" from 6 to 3. all other information in the json will remain the same.
